short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change fonts of any website with your locally installed fonts!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📱Also available on Firefox for Android: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/fontonic

🌟New in v1.7.4:
- Added support for more fonts

🌟New in v1.7.3:
- Minor bug fixes

🌟New in v1.7.2:
- Fixed a bug where two different fonts with "sans" in the name couldn't be used 

🌟New in v1.7.1:
- Support for more websites
- Fixed sluggish behaviour on some reported sites
- Ability to Bold and Italicize font types
- Other minor bug fixes

🌟New in v1.6:
- New UI
- Several bug fixes for global settings
- Ability to exempt sites from global settings
- Less memory consumption 
- Better performance

🌟New in v1.5:
- Revamped and better support for ⚡️dynamic⚡️ websites!

🌟New in v1.4:
- More websites supported!

🌟New in v1.3:
- Apply your font preferences across all websites you visit
- Keep your existing preferences or override them with global settings at any time

Tired of boring website fonts?

Fontonic lets you take control with a single click!  Change any website's fonts to match your style using the fonts you already have.

Choose from all font types: serif, sans-serif, and monospace.  Customize everything or just a few, the power is yours! ️

See your changes instantly with a single click on "Apply Selection." ✨ 
And best of all, your preferences stick around even after you close the tab! ✅

Don't like your changes? No problem! Simply hit "Restore" to go back to the original fonts. ⏪

I'd love to hear from you! Share your feature requests in the reviews.

View source code: https://github.com/amkhrjee/fontonic

Keywords: Font customization, Website fonts, Personalization, Serif fonts, Sans-serif fonts, Monospace fonts, Apply Selection, Font preferences, Instant preview, Persistent settings, Restore original fonts, Make fonts Bold, Make fonts Italic, Apply custom fonts
